sense.def:
To rap on something
ali
to rap something
pomeni udarjati po nečem z nizom hitrim udarcev.

seg.quote: He rapped on the table and called for silence.

sense.def:
A rap
je hiter udarec z roko ali členkom po čem.

seg.quote: A light rap sounded at the door.

sense.def:
To receive a rap over the knuckles
pomeni dobiti opozorilo ali kritično oceno.

cit.quote: biti okrcan, dobiti jih po prstih

sense.def:
To take the rap
pomeni biti razglašen za krivca ali biti kaznovan za nekaj, tudi takrat, ko nekdo ni kriv;

cit.quote: biti grešni kozel, biti kaznovan za kaj

seg.quote: Lloyd will have to take the rap.

sense.def:
To rap out an order or a question
pomeni naglo in ostro povedati ukaz ali vprašanje.

seg.quote: ‘Is that the truth?’ he suddenly rapped out.
